title: Game freezing randomly ingame UNPLAYABLE
body:
Basically this http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4393136

I already repaired, reinstalled league and repaired again, rolled back my drivers, installed and uninstalled and installed again to uninstall the creators update from windows 10 

Only league has the issue.

GTX 970
Core i7 4770k
16gb RAM
Windows 10 duh

replies.body: With using Windows 10 and performing updates, it's likely that the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) auto-enabled.  This has been known to cause the freezing you've mentioned, so disabling it might help.  Test it out in a custom game, and let me know if it helps.
I disabled it and uninstalled xbox previous to this post.

Aha, gotcha!  Other causes of this kind of freezing can be bad game files, hardware, or outdated drivers too.  Since you've already completed a few steps that's including in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually.

Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to that ticket to give us more context.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.  Hang tight!
